item.title: WATCH: Actor Paul Rudd gets song with his pint in Dublin pub
item.description: Hollywood actor Paul Rudd was treated to an impromptu serenade while in a pub in Dublin, Ireland.

item.title: CEO shooting latest: Luigi Mangione had 'written admissions' when arrested
item.description: Luigi Mangione is facing a second-degree murder charge in New York City in connection with the brazen shooting of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson.

item.title: Son gunned down in home invasion fought back, tried to help mom; suspect at large
item.description: Police in Pennsylvania are searching for the gunman wanted for killing a young man and wounding his mother during a home invasion in an upscale Philad...

item.title: US seeks to balance backing Syrian people, protecting American interests: ANALYSIS
item.description: The Biden administration wants to avoid a power vacuum after the rebel takeover.

item.title: What we know about Luigi Mangione, man charged in CEO's murder
item.description: Video captured the moment the gunman walked up behind the CEO outside the Hilton in Midtown Manhattan, pointed his gun at him and fired.
